review: I love the Fire TV Stick! It was so easy to install, and the options for viewing are great--so much to choose from, I don't know where to begin! Also, the quality of video is so much better than our cable, which keeps sputtering and skipping and telling us "this channel will be available shortly." We are using the Fire TV Stick with WiFi, from our cable company, but we will probably be discontinuing the cable tv. For the ease of use, the quality of the watching experience, and the huge selection of movies, television shows, etc., available through by Prime subscription, the Fire TV Stick is an amazing value. If you are a Prime member, what are you waiting for?
